SEARCH
Package game

Class Board

java.lang.Object
game.Board
public class Board extends Object
The Board class represents the game board in a Backgammon game. It includes methods for adding checkers, assigning initial checkers to points, and displaying the game board with status, moves, scores and pip counts.

  • Method Details

    • addChecker

      public void addChecker(Point point, int count, Triangle.Checker checker)
      Adds a specified number of checkers to a given point on the board.
      Parameters:
      point - The point to which checkers will be added.
      count - The number of checkers to add.
      checker - The checker type to be added (X or O).

    • assignCheckers

      public void assignCheckers(Point[] points)
      Assigns initial checkers to the game board points.
      Parameters:
      points - The array of points representing the game board.

    • display

      public void display(boolean flag, Point[] points, User player1, User player2)
      Displays the game board with the current checkers' distribution.
      Parameters:
      flag - A boolean flag representing the current player's turn.
      points - The array of points representing the game board.
      player1 - The User object representing player 1.
      player2 - The User object representing player 2.

    • displayPip

      public static void displayPip(String player1Name, String player2Name, int player1Pip, int player2Pip)
      Displays the pip count for a specific player.
      Parameters:
      player1Name - The name of player 1.
      player2Name - The name of player 2.
      player1Pip - The pip count for player 1.
      player2Pip - The pip count for player 2.

    • rollDice

      public static int rollDice()
      Simulates the rolling of a six-sided die and returns the result.
      Returns:
      A random integer between 1 and 6, inclusive.

    • displayUpperPips

      public static void displayUpperPips(Point[] points, boolean flag)
      Displays the pip counts for the upper section of the board.
      Parameters:
      points - The array of points representing the game board.
      flag - A boolean flag representing the current player's turn.

    • displayLowerPips

      public static void displayLowerPips(Point[] points, boolean flag)
      Displays the pip counts for the upper section of the board.
      Parameters:
      points - The array of points representing the game board.
      flag - A boolean flag representing the current player's turn.
